message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $10,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to at least get $11,000 for the product.  This is still a great deal for you, considering its value. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can do $10,800, but that's as high as I can go. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too far apart on price.  I'm willing to compromise and come down to $11,200, but I need to get at least that much to make this worthwhile. I think this price is still a good deal for you considering the value you'll get from the product.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I can do $10,900, and that's my final offer. If you can meet me there, I'm willing to make a deal.
